name: Arc'teryx Eris T-Shirt - Men's
description:
For those casual days that might involve a send or two. The Eris’ clean lines and soft cotton blend look at home in the city, while the gusseted sleeves help you reach for a high hold (or beerglass at the back of the shelf).Crafted from a blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester that is super soft and helps wick away moisture.Single laminated chest pocket is a home for your sunnies.Stealthy underarm gussets allow movement while keeping the clean t-shirt lines.Regular fit.

        Sustainability
